name: Smash!
desc: Gain an Alistar. He restores 10 Mana per second and his Ability hits all enemies within 1 hex.

name: Behemoth
desc: Gain an Alistar. He gains 300 bonus Health and his Ability deals bonus damage equal to 30% of his maximum Health.

name: Reflector Shield
desc: Gain an Annie. While her Ability's shield is active, enemies that attack her take 175 magic damage (once every 0.5 seconds).

name: Burning Spirit
desc: Gain an Annie. When you field her, your team gains 15 Ability Power, tripled while they are below 50% Health.

name: Armor Piercing Rounds
desc: Gain an Aphelios. His attacks reduce the target's Armor by 10% for the rest of combat (this can stack).

name: Locked and Loaded
desc: Gain an Aphelios. When you field him, your team gains 15% Attack Damage and an additional 5% every 5 seconds.

name: Laser Focus
desc: Gain an Ashe. She gains 40% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

name: Corps Focus
desc: Gain an Ashe. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

name: Extinction Event
desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. He gains 10 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

name: Velocity Impact
desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. His Ability stuns enemies hit for 2 seconds.

name: Back for Blood
desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. She gains 25% Omnivamp, tripled while under 50% Health.

name: Voidmother
desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. Combat Start: Your strongest Bel'Veth creates 2 Voidspawns with 75% of their normal Health in front of her.

name: Dynamic Defenses
desc: Gain a Gargoyle Stoneplate and a Blitzcrank. When he casts his Ability, its duration increases by 2 second per enemy targeting him.

name: Rocket Grab
desc: Gain a Blitzcrank. Gain a 300 Health. Combat Start: He pulls the farthest enemy and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.

name: Adaptive Defensives
desc: Gain a Camille. She gains 35% Attack Damage. The first time she drops below 50% Health, she gains a shield equal to 600% of her Attack Damage .

name: Hextech Retribution
desc: Gain a Camille. When you field her, your team deals 10% bonus damage, increasing by an additional 5% whenever an ally dies.

name: Energy Void
desc: Gain a Cho'Gath. Each time his Ability hits an enemy, he steals 20% of their Magic Resist.

name: Cosmic Barrier
desc: Gain a Cho'Gath. When you field Cho'Gath, your team gains 40 Magic Resist, doubled for Cho'Gath.

name: League of Draven
desc: Gain a Draven. He gains 35% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 35% chance to gain 1 gold.

name: Ruthless Blades
desc: Gain a Draven. When you field him, your team gains 55% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Resonance
desc: Gain an Ekko. His ability hits all enemies within 2 hexes and deals additional damage equal to 300% of his Magic Resistance.

name: Chronobreak
desc: Gain an Ekko. When you field him, he stuns all enemies for 2 seconds after 10 seconds of combat.

name: Rising Spell Force
desc: Gain an Ezreal. When he casts his Ability, he gains 20% Attack Speed and 20 Ability Power for the rest of combat (this can stack).

name: Raider's Spoils
desc: Gain an Ezreal. Combat Start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat and gains 1 gold.

name: Traumatic Memories
desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. When an ally dies, it gains 200 bonus Health for the rest of combat.

name: Absolute Corruption
desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Combat Start: Fiddlesticks grants its nearest ally 30 Ability Power and allows them to share its Corrupted souls.

name: Frontline Fencing
desc: Gain a Fiora. While her Ability is active, she gains 150 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Vitality of the Ox
desc: Gain a Fiora. When you field her, your team heals 2% of their maximum Health when they attack.

name: Justice Punch
desc: Gain a Galio. His Ability deals 75% more damage and knocks up its target for 2 seconds.

name: Safety First
desc: Gain a Galio. When you field him, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

name: Flaming Ricochet
desc: Gain a Gangplank. His Ability bounces to a second target dealing 60% damage.

name: Get Paid
desc: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 33% chance to gain 1 gold on kill.

name: Rapid Reporting
desc: Gain a Janna. Her Ability restores 5 Mana per enemy hit.

name: Exaggerated Reporting
desc: Gain a Janna. Forecaster's effects are increased by 100%.

name: Relentless Assault
desc: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, he gains 9% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

name: Evasion
desc: Gain a Jax. When you field him, your team gains 100% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds the first time they fall below 50% Health each combat.

name: Get Excited!
desc: Gain a Jinx. When she scores a takedown, she gains 110% Attack Speed and Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

name: Everyone Goes BOOM!
desc: Gain a Jinx. When you field her, your team gains 9% Attack Speed, tripled after the first enemy dies each combat.

name: Multi-Shot
desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. Every 3 attacks, she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

name: Star-Crossed
desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. She grants 100% of her Ability's Attack Speed bonus to her nearest ally.

name: Divine Ascent
desc:
Gain a Kayle. She gains bonuses per star level.
1: 30% Attack Speed
2: +2 Attack Range
3: Attacks fire 2 additional bolts dealing 50% damage.

name: Righteous Range
desc: Gain a Kayle. Combat Start: She and her 2 nearest allies gain +2 Attack Range and 25% Attack Speed.

name: Aim Assist
desc: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 2 sigils fired by her Ability, she fires an additional sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

name: Mirror Image
desc: Gain a LeBlanc. Combat Start: Your strongest LeBlanc creates a 70% Health, itemless clone of her nearest ally.

name: Flurry
desc: Gain a Lee Sin. He gains 60% Attack Speed, tripled for 5 seconds after casting his Ability.

name: Invigorate
desc: Gain a Lee Sin. When your field him, your team gains 15% Attack Speed, doubled for 3 seconds after being shielded.

name: Perfected Solar Flare
desc: Gain a Leona. She gains 30 Ability Power and her maximum Mana is reduced by 30.

name: Eclipse Prime
desc: Gain a Leona. When you field her, your team reduces all incoming damage by 20.

name: Growth Spurt
desc: Gain a Lulu. When she casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 20 Ability Power (this can stack).

name: Foster Growth
desc: Gain a Lulu. When you field her, she and her allies gain 35 Ability Power when equipped with an item.

name: Illuminating Singularity
desc: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, her Ability deals 180% increased damage.

name: Lucent Barrier
desc: Gain a Lux. Combat Start: She grants her 2 nearest allies a 400 Health Shield and 40 Ability Power.

name: Rock Solid
desc: Gain a Malphite. He gains Ability Power equal to 75% of his Armor and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 4 seconds.

name: Guardian Spirit
desc: Gain a Malphite. When you field him, your team restores 20% of their missing Health on cast.

name: Bunny Mercenary
desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. Her Ability covers a wider cone and she gains a 250 Health shield while channeling.

name: Make It Rain
desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, she drops 20 gold.

name: Not So Heavy Metal
desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. He gains 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

name: Obliterate
desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. Combat Start: He reduces enemy Armor and Magic Resist by 20%.

name: Stacks on Stacks
desc: Gain a Nasus. He gains 20% Attack Damage, increased by 3% permanently each time he casts his Ability.

name: Soul Eater
desc: Gain a Nasus. When you field him, he and his allies heal 300 Health on takedowns.

name: Gifted
desc: Gain a Nilah. She gains 40 Ability Power. Combat Start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

name: Jubilant Veil
desc: Gain a Nilah. Combat Start: She and her 2 nearest allies gain immunity to crowd control for 20 seconds.

name: They See Me Rolling
desc: Gain a Nunu. When you field him, your team gains 20 Ability Power and an additional 5 every 5 seconds.

name: Contagious Laughter
desc: Gain a Nunu. He gains 10 Ability Power and restores @Mana@ Mana per second.

name: Bigger, Better Buckler
desc: Gain a Poppy. She gains 200 Armor.

name: Steadfast Presence
desc: Gain a Poppy. Combat Start: Your strongest Poppy grants all allies a 325 Health shield.

name: Armored-dillo
desc: Gain a Rammus. When you field him, your team gains 40 Armor, doubled for himself.

name: Spiked Shell
desc: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, he deals magic damage equal to 180% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2 seconds).

name: Hold the Line
desc: Gain a Rell. She gains 50 Ability Power and 30% damage reduction.

name: Channelled Ferromancy
desc: Gain a Rell. When you field her, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist. Each ally gains an additional 5 when they cast (this can stack).

name: Partners in Crime
desc: Gain a Viego. When you field him, your team gains 15% Omnivamp, tripled when 2 or less allies remain.

name: Reign of Anger
desc: Gain a Renekton. He gains 40% Attack Speed and an additional 2% per 100 missing Health.

name: Cull the Meek
desc: Gain a Renekton. When you field him, your team deals 10% bonus damage, tripled against enemies below 50% Health.

name: Reverberation
desc: Gain a Riven. She gains 20 Ability Power and her Ability is additionally cast on her lowest Health ally.

name: Triumphant Return
desc: Gain a Riven. Combat Start: She grants herself and adjacent allies a shield for 15 seconds equal to 40% of their maximum Health.

name: Style & Flair
desc: Gain a Samira. She gains 30% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 30% of her maximum Mana.

name: Daredevil
desc: Gain a Samira. For every 10 Tactician Health missing, she grants your team 4.5% Attack Speed.

name: Glacial Prison
desc: Gain a Sejuani. She gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist and her Ability hits the entire board.

name: Shatter
desc: Gain a Sejuani. Her Ability stuns for 1 more seconds, and enemies take 20% more damage while stunned.

name: Absolution
desc: Gain a Senna. She gains 30% Attack Speed and an additional 10% every 5 seconds.

name: Corps Formation
desc: Gain a Senna. Combat Start: She grants herself and adjacent allies 30% Attack Damage.

name: Punch Protocol
desc: Gain a Sett. He gains 40 Armor and Magic Resist. His Ability knocks back the first enemy struck, destroying them if knocked off the battlefield.

name: Regenerative Shields
desc: Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari and a Sett. Briefly after the shields of his team break, he recharges them at 40% strength for 3 seconds.

name: Delivery Tips
desc: Gain a Sivir. Every 2nd Ability cast, your strongest Sivir drops 1 gold with a 5% chance to gain 1 additional gold.

name: Endless Pizza
desc: Gain a Sivir. When you field her, your team heals 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. Eliminate all harmful effects.

name: Power Grid
desc: Gain a Sona. She gains 30 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

name: Undercurrent
desc: Gain a Sona. Combat Start: Your strongest Sona grants her 2 nearest allies 50 Mana.

name: Infuse
desc: Gain a Soraka. Every 5 seconds, Soraka grants your team 15 Mana.

name: Upgrade: Berserk
desc: Gain a Soraka. After 15 seconds of combat, all of her Ability casts are empowered.

name: Kingslayer
desc: Gain a Sylas. His Ability deals 50% more damage and restores 15% of his missing Health.

name: Petricite Chains
desc: Gain a Sylas. When you field him, your team gains 30 starting Mana and his Ability increases enemies' maximum Mana by 35%.

name: Power Overwhelming
desc: Gain a Syndra. Allies summoned by her Ability gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist.

name: Empowered Reserves
desc: Gain a Syndra. When you field her, your team gains 7 Ability Power per unit on your bench.

name: Stoneweaver
desc: Gain a Taliyah. She gains 25 Ability Power and her Ability deals 30% more damage to enemies above 1600 maximum Health.

name: Be the Stone
desc: Gain a Taliyah. Combat Start: She shields the 3 highest Health allies for 60% of their maximum Health.

name: Edgelord
desc: Gain a Talon. He gains 40 Ability Power. After killing an enemy, he restores 40 Mana.

name: OX-ian Rage
desc: Gain a Talon. When you field him, your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 15 Ability Power, tripled when they are below 50% Health.

name: Shiny
desc: Gain an Urgot. His Ability has an additional 25% chance to dredge up treasure.

name: Rising Tide
desc: Gain an Urgot. Combat Start: He grants himself and adjacent allies 30% Attack Speed.

name: Spread Shot
desc: Gain a Vayne. Her Ability additionally fires at 2 other nearby enemies dealing 35% damage.

name: Into the Night
desc: Gain an Edge of Night and a Vayne. When you field her, allies equipped with Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

name: Frostburn
desc: Gain a Vel'Koz. His Ability deals an additional 200% of its damage over the next 15 seconds (this can stack).

name: Frozen Tundra
desc: Gain a Vel'Koz. Combat Start: He slows the Attack Speed of all enemies by 30% for 6 seconds.

name: Unrelenting Force
desc: Gain a Vi. When she takes damage, she gains 2% Attack Damage, 2 Armor, and 2 Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

name: Boxing Lessons
desc: Gain a Vi. When you field her, your team gains 250 bonus Health.

name: Heartstopper
desc: Gain a Viego. He gains 10 Ability Power and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

name: Cyclone
desc: Gain a Wukong. He gains 10 Ability Power and increases his Ability's range by 1 hex.

name: Re-Energize
desc: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 75% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

name: Siphoning Winds
desc: Gain a Yasuo. He gains 66% Omnivamp.

name: Spirit of the Exile
desc: Gain a Yasuo. When you field him, allies who start combat with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Speed.

name: Predatory Precision
desc: Gain a Yuumi. She gains 30 Ability Power, 75% Critical Strike Chance and her Ability can critically strike.

name: Zoomies!
desc: Gain a Yuumi. When you field her, your team 20% Attack Speed, and zooms towards their targets.

name: Supersize
desc: Gain a Zac. He gains 1000 bonus Health and is immune to crowd control.

name: Elastic Slingshot
desc: Gain a Zac. Combat Start: He flings his 2 nearest allies to the enemy backline, knocking up enemies upon impact for 3 seconds.

name: Shadow Jutsu
desc: Gain a Zed. He gains 15% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, he gains 15% of their Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

name: Contempt for the Weak
desc: Gain a Zed. When you field him, your team gains 12% Attack Speed. Upon scoring a taking down their target, they dash to a new one and triple this bonus for 2.5 seconds.

name: Double Bubble
desc: Gain a Zoe. Her Ability launches a second bubble at a different target, dealing 60% damage.

name: Sleepy Time
desc: Gain a Zoe. Combat Start: She puts to sleep the 3 lowest Health enemies stunning them for 4 seconds.

name: Battlemage I
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

name: Blue Battery I
desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

name: Celestial Blessing I
desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

name: Cybernetic Implants I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 20 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink I
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

name: Exiles I
desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United I
desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge I
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 40-100 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights I
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: First Aid Kit
desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

name: Future Sight I
desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

name: Item Grab Bag I
desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

name: Luden's Echo I
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 40-100 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Makeshift Armor I
desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Knife's Edge I
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

name: Pandora's Items
desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

name: Recombobulator
desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

name: Second Wind I
desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

name: Thrill of the Hunt I
desc: Your units heal 300 Health on kill.

name: Tiny Titans
desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

name: Built Different I
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: Tri Force I
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 75 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

name: Double Trouble I
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: AFK
desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

name: Band of Thieves I
desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

name: Big Friend I
desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1650 Health take 9% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Consistency
desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

name: Lategame Specialist
desc: Gain 40 gold when you reach Level 9.

name: Pandora's Bench
desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

name: Preparation I
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: A.D.M.I.N. Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional A.D.M.I.N. Gain a Camille.

name: Aegis Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Aegis. Gain a Vi.

name: Anima Squad Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Anima Squad. Gain a Jinx.

name: Brawler Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Brawler. Gain a Vi.

name: Spellslinger Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Spellslinger. Gain an Annie.

name: Sureshot Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sureshot. Gain a Sivir.

name: Defender Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Defender. Gain a Rell.

name: Duelist Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Duelist. Gain a Fiora.

name: Hacker Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hacker. Gain 2 gold.

name: Heart Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Heart. Gain a Lee Sin.

name: Lasercorps Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional LaserCorps. Gain a Yasuo.

name: Mascot Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mascot. Gain a Yuumi.

name: Ox Force Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ox Force. Gain a Fiora.

name: Recon Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Recon. Gain an Ezreal.

name: Renegade Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Renegade. Gain a Camille.

name: Star Guardian Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Star Guardian. Gain a Yuumi.

name: Aegis Crest
desc: Gain an Aegis Emblem and a Vi.

name: Underground Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Vi.

name: Ascension
desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

name: Battlemage II
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

name: Calculated Loss
desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

name: Celestial Blessing II
desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

name: Clear Mind
desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

name: Component Grab Bag
desc: Gain 3 random item components.

name: Cybernetic Implants II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 30 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink II
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

name: Exiles II
desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

name: Stand United II
desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge II
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 85-145 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights II
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: Hustler
desc: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

name: Jeweled Lotus
desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

name: Luden's Echo II
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 55-160 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Makeshift Armor II
desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Knife's Edge II
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

name: Metabolic Accelerator
desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

name: Portable Forge
desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

name: Rich Get Richer
desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Rich Get Richer+
desc: Gain 20 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Salvage Bin
desc: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

name: Second Wind II
desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

name: Sunfire Board
desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

name: Phony Frontline
desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

name: Three's Company
desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

name: Thrill of the Hunt II
desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

name: Ancient Archives I
desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

name: Trade Sector
desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

name: Trade Sector+
desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 12 golds.

name: Built Different II
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-350 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: Tri Force II
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

name: True Twos
desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

name: Double Trouble II
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 35 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Big Friend II
desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1650 Health take 15% less damage for the rest of combat.

name: Combat Training
desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8% Attack Damage.

name: Cluttered Mind
desc: If your bench is full at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

name: First Aid Kit II
desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

name: Last Stand
desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

name: Preparation II
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Scoped Weapons I
desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 10% Attack Speed.

name: Urf's Grab Bag I
desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

name: A.D.M.I.N Crest
desc: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

name: Ace Crest
desc: Gain an Ace Emblem and a 2 gold.

name: Anima Squad Crest
desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Sylas.

name: Brawler Crest
desc: Gain a Brawler Emblem and a Lee Sin.

name: Spellslinger Crest
desc: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem and an Annie.

name: Civilian Crest
desc: Gain a Civilian Emblem and a Galio.

name: Sureshot Crest
desc: Gain a Sureshot Emblem and a Sivir.

name: Defender Crest
desc: Gain a Defender Emblem and a Poppy.

name: Duelist Crest
desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Yasuo.

name: Mecha: PRIME Crest
desc: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem and a Draven.

name: Gadgeteen Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Annie.

name: Hacker Crest
desc: Gain a Hacker Emblem and 2 gold.

name: Heart Crest
desc: Gain a Heart Emblem and a Yuumi.

name: LaserCorps Crest
desc: Gain an LaserCorps Emblem and a Yasuo.

name: Mascot Crest
desc: Gain a Mascot Emblem and a Yuumi.

name: Ox Force Crest
desc: Gain an Ox Force Emblem and an Annie.

name: Prankster Crest
desc: Gain a Prankster Emblem and a Jinx.

name: Recon Crest
desc: Gain a Recon Emblem.

name: Renegade Crest
desc: Gain a Renegade Emblem and a Talon.

name: Star Guardian Crest
desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

name: Supers Heart
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Malphite.

name: Threat Level: Maximum
desc: At the start of combat, your Threats gain 75 Maximum Health for every Threat champion on your board.

name: Band of Thieves II
desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

name: BattlemageIII
desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

name: Binary Airdrop
desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain 1 random item components.

name: Celestial Blessing III
desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

name: Cybernetic Implants III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 180 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Shell III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 180 Health and 40 Armor.

name: Cybernetic Uplink III
desc: Your champions holding an item gain 180 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

name: Stand United III
desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Electrocharge III
desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 115-235 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

name: Featherweights III
desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

name: New Recruit
desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

name: Future Sight II
desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

name: Golden Ticket
desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

name: High Roller
desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 6 gold.

name: Item Grab Bag II
desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

name: Luden's Echo III
desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-240 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

name: Knife's Edge III
desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 40 Attack Damage.

name: Radiant Relics
desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

name: March of Progress
desc: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

name: The Golden Egg
desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 10 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

name: Wise Spending
desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

name: Built Different III
desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-450 Health and 50-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

name: Tri Force III
desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

name: Double Trouble III
desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

name: Verdant Veil
desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

name: Windfall
desc: Gain 20 gold.

name: Windfall+
desc: Gain 35 gold.

name: Windfall++
desc: Gain 40 gold.

name: Woodland Charm
desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

name: Birthday Present
desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1). Gain additional 1 gold every time you level up.

name: Cursed Crown
desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

name: Living Forge
desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

name: Lucky Gloves
desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

name: Preparation III
desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

name: Cruel Pact
desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. But Heal 3 Health after a round.

name: Think Fast
desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 8 gold.

name: Ancient Archives II
desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits.

name: Urf's Grab Bag II
desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

name: A.D.M.I.N Crown
desc: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

name: Ace Crown
desc: Gain an Ace Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and 2 gold.

name: Aegis Crown
desc: Gain an Aegis Emblem, a Redemption, and an Alistar.

name: Anima Squad Crown
desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Riven.

name: Brawler Crown
desc: Gain a Brawler Emblem, a Redemption, and a Riven.

name: Spellslinger Crown
desc: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Sona.

name: Civilian Crown
desc: Gain a Civilian Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Sivir.

name: Sureshot Crown
desc: Gain a Sureshot Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Senna.

name: Defender Crown
desc: Gain a Defender Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

name: Duelist Crown
desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem, an Edge of Night, and a Nilah.

name: Mecha: PRIME Crown
desc: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem, a Titan's Resolve , and a Jax.

name: Gadgeteen Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Ionic Spark and an Annie.

name: Hacker Crown
desc: Gain a Hacker Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Leblanc.

name: Heart Crown
desc: Gain a Heart Emblem, a ZZ'rot Portal, and a Sona.

name: LaserCorps Crown
desc: Gain a LaserCorps Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Senna.

name: Mascot Crown
desc: Gain a Mascot Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and an Malphite.

name: Ox Force Crown
desc: Gain an Ox Force Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Alistar.

name: Prankster Crown
desc: Gain a Prankster Emblem, an Edge of Night, and a Zoe.

name: Recon Crown
desc: Gain a Recon Emblem, a Zeke's Herald, and a Ezreal.

name: Renegade Crown
desc: Gain a Renegade Crown, a Bloodthirster, and a Camille.

name: Star Guardian Crown
desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Chalice of Power and a Nilah.

name: Supers Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Lee Sin.

name: Underground Soul
desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Hextech Gunblade and an Ezreal.
